text: Cathayan Ogres (Great Weapons)
Ogres enjoy training in Cathay, and the greatswords from Cathay enhance their cutting power, making them very popular among Ogres.
Ogres enjoy training in Cathay, and the greatswords from Cathay enhance their cutting power, making them very popular among Ogres.
Cathayan Ogres (Dual Weapons)
Ogres enjoy training in Cathay, and the dual blades from Cathay allow them to slash freely in battle, being far sharper than the weapons Ogres forge themselves.
Ogres enjoy training in Cathay, and the dual blades from Cathay allow them to slash freely in battle, being far sharper than the weapons Ogres forge themselves.
Leadbelchers (Witch Hammers)
The Leadbelchers operate powerful cannons captured from the Empire.
The Leadbelchers operate powerful cannons captured from the Empire.
Leadbelchers (Flamers)
The Leadbelchers operate powerful cannons captured from the Dwarfs.
The Leadbelchers operate powerful cannons captured from the Dwarfs.
Wild Rhinoxes
The terrifying strength of this beast comes from its muscular, robust body; a charge from a Rhinox is devastating.
Huge, hairy, and temperamental, the Rhinox is a large and dangerous long-horned beast that will lower its horns and charge at anything in its way, even the largest creatures.
Wild Stonehorns
The Stonehorns are exceptionally aggressive; their first reaction to any creature in its sight is to charge at it.
These mammoth-like creatures embodies everything Ogres admire: size, brutality, strength, and toughness, making Ogres hold the Stonehorn in great reverence.
Gnoblar Stalkers
The Gnoblar Stalkers attack enemies with poisoned daggers.
The Gnoblar Stalkers attack enemies with poisoned daggers.
Gnoblar Archers
The Gnoblar Archers attack enemies with bows, but they have almost no combat ability, making them true cannon fodder.
The Gnoblar Archers attack enemies with bows, but they have almost no combat ability, making them true cannon fodder.
Gnoblar Wolf Rider Archers
The Gnoblars have tamed a small number of wolves, using their mobility to help these cannon fodders survive longer.
The Gnoblars have tamed a small number of wolves, using their mobility to help these cannon fodders survive longer.
Gnoblar Wolf Riders
The Gnoblars use wolves as mounts in battle, but their fragile morale makes these wolf riders more prone to scattering and fleeing.

Eshin Maneaters
Ogre Hunters
Hunters skilled in capturing and hunting a variety of massive monsters, using ranged weapons to strike at their enemies.
Hunters adept at tracking and hunting large monstrous beasts, utilizing ranged weapons to take down their prey.
